kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Then Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'css:mat-toolbar > mat-toolbar-row a.nav-link > img' is displayed.

kw.name: And Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: And Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css:.hero-headline' contains exact text 'The modern web developer's platform'.

kw.name: And Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Then Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: And Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css:h1' contains exact text 'Getting started with Angular'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
